title: Ultra Rare High Grade Cards Wanted
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Ultra Rare High Grade Cards Wanted
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Dorskind


Happy New Year

In celebration of our 35th anniversary as collectors
of ultra-rare high grade type cards, we continue to
add prudently to our collection.

Our primary interest is in high grade type cards. We
prefer that the extant example for said collection is that
of non-HOF.  Should you have any of the items below for
sale or trade, please contact us.  Confidentiality assured on all
transactions

Ten Most Wanted Type Cards

T 208 Fireside  PSA or SGC 4 or above
T 216 Peoples Tobacco- PSA 5 or above
Lections- PSA or SGC 5 or above
Texas Tommy (types 1 and 2)  PSA/SGC 5 above
D 380 Clements Bread  PSA/SGC 5 and above
E 99  Bishop  PSA/SGC 5 above
E 221  Bishop Team Cars  PSA/SGC 5 and above
N 162  Goodwins Champsions PSA/SGC7 and above  
N690 Kalamazoo Bat New York player  PSA/SGC5 and above
J+K- PSA/SGC 4 and above

Thanks.  We appreciate your time and consideration

Mr Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List
bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com
